title: Person to person in infancy (TEFC)
creator_credit: United States. Office of Economic Opportunity and L. Joseph Stone
brief_description: Stresses the importance of the human relationships between infant and adult, and shows that in group care as well as at home there can be a considerable range of warmth and adequacy of relationship.
